pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Comparisons Procedures Based on Studentized Midrange and Range Distributions // Apply tests of multiple comparisons based on studentized 'midrange' and 'range' distributions. The tests are: Tukey Midrange ('TM' test), Student-Newman-Keuls Midrange ('SNKM' test), Means Grouping Midrange ('MGM' test) and Means Grouping Range ('MGR' test). The first two tests were published by Batista and Ferreira (2020) doi:10.1590/1413-7054202044008020. The last two were published by Batista and Ferreira (2023) doi:10.28951/bjb.v41i4.640.
